page.title: 04 HOUSING IN OUR AREA
page.content: There is wide varety of housing in our area.Most our block consists of farmland,therefore housing is limited to a few scattered farms.These are large,stone built detached houses with brightly painted walls and roofs. Part of the town of{KILSYTH}lies within our area including the neighbourhoods of {WESTFIELD,NORTH- {FIELD,BALMALLOCH,and ALLANFAULD.}The first 3 of these are areas of council housing,rented out to tenants by the Local Authority.There are various styles ,largely 4-in-a-block or terraced,and ages range from 40-15 years old. {ALLANFAULD}is an area of private housing,owned by those living in them. They are from 10-15 years old,and are largely detached or semi-detached. Prices range from Â£29000-Â£45000. {
